label: 榎本武揚
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: えのもと たけあき
説明文: (1836-1908). Son of a goshi who bought status as gokenin. Student of naval science under Dutch at Nagasaki, then in Holland (from 1862). Senior Bakufu naval post, 1867. Fled to Hokkaido and resisted Restoration, 1868-69. Pardoned in 1872 and appointed to office under Meiji government; rose to cabinet rank.
